section.heading: Definition and applicability.
section.text: As used in this subchapter, “judgment” includes an unconditional decree for the payment of money, and this subchapter is applicable to such a decree.

annotations.annotation: Child support enforcement, income withholding, see § 46-208.
Fraudulent conveyances, remedies of creditors, see § 28-3107.
Superior Court of the District of Columbia, jurisdiction, see § 11-921.
